\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Structure representing a color image. 

It supports both linear and two-\/dimensional access (i.\+e., cimg-\/$>$C\mbox{[}c\mbox{]}-\/$>$data\mbox{[}p\mbox{]} or cimg-\/$>$C\mbox{[}c\mbox{]}-\/$>$array\mbox{[}y\mbox{]}\mbox{[}x\mbox{]} for a pixel (x,y) at address p=x+y$\ast$ncols of channel c).
